params.footer_content: is a marketplace that celebrates local craftsmanship and skills by connecting artisans with buyers. It offers a platform for skilled individuals to showcase their handmade products, promoting traditional and contemporary crafts from Pakistan.

call_to_action.title: Hunar Bazaar
call_to_action.content: is a marketplace that celebrates local craftsmanship and skills by connecting artisans with buyers. It offers a platform for skilled individuals to showcase their handmade products, promoting traditional and contemporary crafts from Pakistan.
